title: Adobe security advisory (AV25-741)
description: On November 11, 2025, Adobe published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Adobe Format Plugins  version 1.1.1 and prior
Adobe Illustrator on iPad  version 3.0.9 and prior
Adobe InDesign  version ID19.5.5 and prior
Adobe InDesign  version ID20.5 and prior
Adobe Pass Authentication Android SDK  version 3.7.3 and prior
Adobe Substance 3D Stager  version 3.1.5 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
